titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the generall assises in Warwicke, the third of March, being the first Friday in Lent. 1619. By Samuel Burton, Archdeacon of Gloucester. Seene and allowed by authoritie
titleStmt.author: Burton, Samuel, 1568 or 9-1634.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Stansby for Nathaniel Butter,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
